attributes.additional_details:
This petition of Tradex, Beckside Road, Bradford, BD7 2JE.

Declares that the Metropolitan District Council of the City of Bradford has acted unfairly and without due regard to the interests of the local community. Tradex has regenerated a decaying premises and community, created jobs and provided business opportunities to young entrepreneurs. It has helped to improve community morale and social integration as well as providing a national attraction for visitors from all areas of the U.K.

Please show your support for Tradex and request the Council for their cooperation in seeking to reach a favourable outcome for the tenants and the wider affected community.
